content: rainbow body rs right side row 5 join red and purl ssk slip the next stitch on the left needle knit- row 6 in red knit break the red yarn wise then slip the next stitch on the left needle purl-wise knit through the front of row 7 join orange and purl the 2 slipped stitches decrease by 1 row 8 in orange knit break the orange yarn st s stitch es row 9 join yellow and purl st st stockinette row 10 in yellow knit break the yellow yarn ws wrong side row 11 join green and purl row 12 in green knit break the green yarn row 13 join blue and purl row 14 in blue knit break the blue yarn row 15 join indigo and purl row 16 in indigo knit break the indigo yarn row 17 join violet and purl row 18 in violet knit break the violet yarn join the brown yarn to work the remaining row for knitting pattern the head legs row 19 to 23 starting on a ws purl row work 5 make 4 cast on 6 sts in brown yarn on 2 75mm row in st st needles start at the top edge row 24 k1 ssk ssk kfb 4 times k2tog k2tog row 1 to 5 starting on a ws purl row work 5 row k1 14 sts in st st row 25 purl ⇨ note this row is the neck pull through to cast off row 26 k3 kfb k1 4 times k3 18 sts row 27 to 29 starting on a ws purl row work 3 body row in st st make 1 cast on 8 sts in brown yarn on 2 75mm row 30 k3 ssk k1 2 times k1 k2tog 2 times needles start at the bottom end k3 14 sts small sausage dog copyright © 2020 amanda berry page 2 of 3 row 31 purl making up row 32 k3 ssk ssk k2tog k2tog k3 10 sts ⇨ note use your cast on/off tails for seaming in row 33 to 37 starting on a ws purl row work 5 mattress stitch unless otherwise instructed a one row in st st stitch seam allowance has been included in the pattern row 38 k2tog 5 times 5 sts body & head sew the side edges together pull through to cast off stuffing as you sew and gather the cast on sts together at the back note that the seam runs ears down the underside make 2 make a slip knot in brown on a 2 75mm nose cut a 30cm length of black dk yarn and sew needle start at the tip/bottom end of the ear over the front end of the head 5 or 6 times to embroider the nose and bury the yarn ends inside row 1 kfb 2 sts the stuffing row 2 knit row 3 kfb kfb 4 sts row 4 to 9 knit row 10 k1 k2tog k1 3 sts row 11
